fiftyCard.heading: 50% Needs:
fiftyCard.body: Allocate half of your income to cover basic needs such as rent, food, utilities, and transportation.

thirtyCard.heading: 30% Wants:
thirtyCard.body: Use 30% of your income for non-essential expenses or 'wants,' such as entertainment, dining out, or personal purchases.

twentyCard.heading: 20% Savings and Debt:
twentyCard.body: Allocate the remaining 20% to savings or debt repayment. This includes contributions to emergency funds, savings for long-term goals, or additional debt payments.
